Boyz II Men - Pass you by
This screen doubles as the home screen and the songs screen. It displays the songs in alphabetical order starting from A-Z.

This screen shows the currently playing song. It displays the song that is being played at the moment at the bottom of the screen. It implements the play back functionality using the android MediaPlayer class. It also plays songs via the online cloud streaming platform https://www.soundcloud.com. It also displays the seekBar, repeat, shuffle, skip-next, skip-previous, favorite, as well as the play/pause button for easy usage and control.
This screen shows the search option of the project. It displays the search option as well as the search suggestions with some songs attached to it.

This screen shows the payment option. It displays the subscription button which enables the user to become a paid member. Payment can be made via the android pay platform as well as via paypal.com. Premium membership gives the user access to an unlimited stream of music via the cloud streaming platform www.soundcloud.com
